original: Melin, David Harald Georg, kyrkoherde, Tibro, f. 1/1/99 i Dimbo, Ska-rab. il., av kontr :pro’sten Samuel M. o. Hilda Stenborg. G. 33 m. Kerstin Janson. Barn: Elisabet f. 35, Ragnhild 37, Sverker 38, d. 44, Ingemar 41. — Stud :ex. i Skara 18, teo’1. fil. ex. i Gbg 19, teol. kand. i Upps. 25, prakt, teol. ex. o. prästv. i Skara ’S. å. V. pastor i Dimbo 25, past:adj. i Tidaholm 26, v. pastor i Börstig 26-27, past:adj. i Tidaholm 27-29, kommin. i Nykyrka 29, kyrkoh. i Tibro ^sed. 40. Ordf. i Tibro o. Mofalla kyrkoråd, pastoratets gemens, kyrkoråd o. i Mofalla skolråd, i Tibro ordf. i kyrkofullm., led. av barnav:nd, ordf. i kyrkl. ungd :krets.
translated: Melin, David Harald Georg, pastor, Tibro, born 1/1/1899 in Dimbo, Skaraborg county, son of the vicar Samuel M. and Hilda Stenborg. Married in 1933 to Kerstin Janson. Children: Elisabet, born in 1935, Ragnhild in 1937, Sverker in 1938 (deceased in 1944), and Ingemar in 1941. Completed theological studies in Skara in 1918, received a Bachelor of Philosophy degree in Gothenburg in 1919, and a Master's degree in Theology in Uppsala in 1925. Completed the practical theological examination and was ordained as a priest in Skara the same year. Worked as a vicar in Dimbo in 1925, assistant pastor in Tidaholm in 1926, assistant pastor in Börstig from 1926-1927, assistant pastor in Tidaholm from 1927-1929, curate in Nykyrka in 1929, and became the vicar of Tibro in 1940. Chairman of the church councils in Tibro and Mofalla, the joint parish council, and the Mofalla school council. Also served as chairman of the church council board, member of the child welfare committee, and chairman of the church youth association in Tibro.
